name: Kaizou Choujin Shubibinman Zero
overview: A Super Famicom game in the Shubibinman series available exclusively for many years as a download via the Broadcast Satellaview satellite service in Japan until 2017, when minor retailers started to release it as cartridge. Shubibinman is a series of games that resemble the Rockman/Megaman series in some respects. This franchise is know is western countries as Shockman.
